About Us

Who We Are, What We Stand For!

Every dream begins with a vision, and at RnR AU Educational Consultancy Services, we are here to turn those dreams into reality. With a passion for helping students and professionals unlock global opportunities, we are committed to providing a stress-free pathway to studying, working, and migrating to Australia. At the heart of RnR AU are Ms. Frezy Ranjo, CEO, and Mr. James Roache, Senior Consultant, two industry experts who understand the complexities of international education and migration. With years of experience, they built RnR AU to bridge the gap between aspiring individuals and life-changing opportunities abroad.

We believe education is more than just earning a degree—it’s about creating a clear and achievable path to a better future. That’s why we go beyond traditional consultancy services. We only partner with trusted and top universities in Australia, ensuring that our students receive the highest quality education and globally recognized credentials. Through exclusive partnerships with institutions like GeSS Education and OBA Nursing Academy, we provide students and professionals with Employment and Visa Sponsorship packages, helping them secure long-term careers in Australia.To make migration more accessible and stress-free, we offer an alternative pathway—allowing students to study and complete their training in the Philippines while staying close to their loved ones. Upon completion, they can transition to Australia through the Skilled Migration Visa Pathway, bypassing the financial and visa-related hurdles of the student visa route.

What sets us apart is our commitment to providing a world-class and stress-free learning experience. Our state-of-the-art facilities, designed to meet Australian standards, include modern offices, student accommodations, and classrooms, ensuring top-quality education and training.From your initial consultation to visa approval, we handle every step of your journey with expertise and care. Whether you choose to study in Australia or start your education in the Philippines before migrating, we ensure a seamless, stress-free, and successful transition.
At RnR AU, we don’t just guide you—we walk with you every step of the way. Your future starts here. Let’s make it happen, together.

University Partners

Stronger Together, Greater Success!

GESS Education

Founded in 2012, GeSS Education was developed with one main purpose; to provide outstanding quality education to all students. Students need the right guidance, encouragement and student materials to enable successful learning. Therefore, our focus is on producing superior learner guides, student and teacher resources, compliant assessments, and exceptional student support!

With our innovative learning management system, our outstanding content is brought to learners directly, either through online learning or as additional interactive materials to accompany classroom-based learning.

Our GeSS LMS learning management system is designed by a team of ‘education experts’ with knowledge and experience in delivering courses to both domestic and international students. Our user-friendly GeSS LMS is purposely designed for students that are looking for a pathway to either university, upskill, reskill, or simply kick start their career.

In 2019 it was decided that 2020 was the year for our next big adventure – to open our own campus on the Gold Coast. Our campus offers not only professional development workshops, but also vocational qualifications delivered on behalf of our partner Institutions to both domestic and international students. GeSS Education is the hub for education excellence on the Gold Coast in the perfect location of Australia Fair, in the heart of Southport CBD looking out towards the Broadwater Parklands and Marina Mirage. With balcony views stretching from SeaWorld down to Surfers Paradise, our campus is a 5 minutes’ walk to all conveniences; tram, major shopping outlets, movie cinemas, Southport Central and many accommodation choices to choose from.

GeSS Education is working on a number of major projects to boost and support Global education, with an emphasis on compliance, and inclusive of our superior customer service! We pride ourselves on always looking at new and innovative ways to support and nurture Industry relationships, with a focus on providing quality education, leading to superior student outcomes and job placement. Through our initiatives GeSS Education will achieve its major goal – help students achieve their dreams by providing superior learning content delivered by industry-led Trainers via classroom based or online classes; that will prepare students for either university or their career.

Campus Activities & Classes

Stronger Together, Greater Success!

120 Hour Job Placement

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to Leah Mae Villarta, PTRP-CEO, Dr. Norman Panfilo G. Rabago, FPCP, MHCA (Internal Medicine & Hypertension Specialist),for their trust and support. Their expertise ensures our program adheres to the highest standards.

Face to Face Class with Filipino GeSS Education Trainers

Face-to-face classes with Filipino instructors at GeSS Education, providing hands-on experience and expert guidance to prepare you for a career in Aged Care.

On-line Class with Australian GeSS Education Trainers

Online classes delivered by Australian GeSS Education Trainers, in accordance with the Australian Qualifications Framework (AQF).

Today, I'm pleased to invite you on behalf of RnR AU Educational and Training Consultancy Services. We're grateful that you took time to visit our website. Our firm's mission revolves around a straightforward principle: to offer top-notch In Country Program for Cert III in Individual Support for Aging and Disability in the Philippines and simultaneously create genuine value for our applicants, our employees, and our community as a whole. Our commitment towards excellence, integrity, and innovation hasn't wavered since our establishment in the year 2024. My role as the CEO of this esteemed organisation gives me immense pride. I'm honoured to be heading a team of exceptional individuals dedicated towards achieving the common goal of continuous enhancement and collaboration. Whether you're an applicant or a student exploring what we have to offer, we are thrilled to share this journey with you. Your interest in RnR AU is highly appreciated, and we anticipate a prosperous growth together.
